error.signature: unable to calculate desired number of replicas: missing request for cpu

verdict.summary: HPA cannot scale because pods don't have CPU/memory resource requests defined.

dead_ends.why_fails: Over or under-provisioning; either wastes resources or causes OOM
Memory scaling is less responsive than CPU for most workloads

workarounds.action: Add resource requests to the pod spec: resources.requests.cpu: 100m
workarounds.how: HPA needs resource requests to calculate utilization percentage

workarounds.action: Use metrics-server to verify metrics are available: kubectl top pods
workarounds.how: HPA requires metrics-server to be installed and running

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'unable to calculate desired number of replicas' indicates HPA unable to fetch metrics, while 'error' indicates an unrecognized CRD kind or API version.
'unable to calculate desired number of replicas' indicates HPA unable to fetch metrics, while 'CreateContainerConfigError' indicates a missing secret or configmap for container config.
